name: Doki Doki Fleeting Feelings
storyline: The last piece of a stylized story. Will you find the answers here? We suggest you play these Mods in that exact order before playing this one - Somnium - Disappearance of the Literature Club - Don't - Hypnopompic - Memories of Nothing.
summary:
“Fleeting Feelings” is a mod for ‘Doki Doki Literature Club’ (DDLC) developed by -M!, serving as the final chapter in a series of interconnected mods. This mod ties together the narratives of the previous episodes, providing a collective conclusion to the saga.

The complete series of mods, known as the “Fleeting Feelings Cinematic Universe”, includes the following titles, recommended to be played in order: -Disappearance of the Literature Club -Don't -Somnium -Memories of Nothing -Hypnopompic -Fleeting Feelings

The plot of “Fleeting Feelings” begins after a successful festival, where the protagonist wakes up the next day and notices drastic changes in the behavior of the members of the literature club, as well as the presence of new characters. The player is challenged to uncover the reason for these changes and understand the new dynamics of the club.
